scripts.build: tsc && npx puppeteer browsers install chrome
scripts.postbuild: apt-get update && apt-get install -y gconf-service libasound2 libatk1.0-0 libc6 libcairo2 libcups2 libdbus-1-3 libexpat1 libfontconfig1 libgcc1 libgconf-2-4 libgdk-pixbuf2.0-0 libglib2.0-0 libnspr4 libnss3 libpango-1.0-0 libx11-xcb1 libxcomposite1 libxdamage1 libxext6 libxfixes3 libxi6 libxrandr2 libxrender1 libxtst6 ca-certificates fonts-liberation libappindicator1 libnss3-1d lsb-release xdg-utils wget
